about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of "Amelie and the Lost Spirit." As Amelie, an adventurous teenager trapped in a parallel realm by a sinister witch, you must navigate through this world filled with puzzles by making the right choices. Your wits will be your greatest asset as you try to escape the witch's clutches.

Embark on an adventure in this horror choices game that seamlessly blends puzzle-solving prowess with spine tingling adventure. Conquer complex puzzles to unlock doors and manipulate your environment.

Enlist the aid of ghostly companions, the trapped children of the parallel world, as you navigate treacherous terrain in this puzzle game. Engage in cunning prank games to distract the witch, buying precious time to outwit them and solve puzzles. Your choices hold sway over the outcome, shaping the narrative and the fates of those involved in this adventure game.

Key Features:


Puzzle Games: Challenge your intellect with a diverse range of mind-bending puzzles, each uniquely designed to test your problem-solving skills.

Adventure Games: Traverse haunting landscapes as you unravel the mysteries of the parallel world, piecing together the narrative one enigmatic step at a time.

Prank Games: Employ humor and misdirection to outsmart the witch's minions, adding a touch of levity to the tense atmosphere.

Choices Games: Your decisions alter the course of the story, determining Amelie's fate and the ultimate outcome of the game.

Dive into a world of mild horror choices game, where every corner holds a secret, and every puzzle is a stepping stone toward freedom. Will you overcome the witch's puzzles and lead Amelie back to reality, or will the parallel world's sinister choices become her eternal prison? The journey awaits, full of puzzles to solve, challenges to conquer, and choices to make.
